data.title: Film Forum · BLUEBEARD’S EIGHTH WIFE & THE SMILING LIEUTENANT
data.meta_description:
BLUEBEARD’S EIGHTH WIFE / THE SMILING LIEUTENANT DOUBLE FEATURE
DATE: Wednesday, June 7

BLUEBEARD’S EIGHTH WIFE 

SHOWTIMES
12:50, 4:20, 7:50   

URGENT TEXT
Directed by Ernst Lubitsch 
Starring Gary Cooper and Claudette Colbert 

(1938) In classic “meeting cute,” American millionaire Gary Cooper and impoverished Claudette Colbert buy, respectively, the top and bottom of the same pair of pj’s; but after love blossoms, she finds he’s a seven-time divorcé. First screenwriting collaboration of Charles Brackett and Billy Wilder. 35mm. Approx. 80 min. 

THE SMILING LIEUTENANT 

SHOWTIMES
2:30, 6:00, 9:30

URGENT TEXT
Directed by Ernst Lubitsch 
Starring Maurice Chevalier and Claudette Colbert 

(1931) Roguish Maurice Chevalier loves violinist Claudette Colbert, but gets trapped into marrying checkers-playing princess Miriam Hopkins. But things look up when good sport Colbert musically advises frumpish Hopkins to “Jazz Up Your Lingerie.” 35mm. Approx. 88 min.
data.text:
BLUEBEARD’S EIGHTH WIFE

Directed by Ernst Lubitsch

Starring Gary Cooper and Claudette Colbert

(1938) In classic “meeting cute,” American millionaire Gary Cooper and impoverished Claudette Colbert buy, respectively, the top and bottom of the same pair of pj’s; but after love blossoms, she finds he’s a seven-time divorcé. First screenwriting collaboration of Charles Brackett and Billy Wilder. 35mm. Approx. 80 min.

12:50, 4:20, 7:50

“The film in which Brackett and Wilder supposedly perfected the Hollywood ploy of ‘meeting cute’ with a Riviera department store scene where Coop wants to buy pyjama tops and Colbert the bottoms.”

– Time Out

THE SMILING LIEUTENANT

Directed by Ernst Lubitsch

Starring Maurice Chevalier and Claudette Colbert

(1931) Roguish Maurice Chevalier loves violinist Claudette Colbert, but gets trapped into marrying checkers-playing princess Miriam Hopkins. But things look up when good sport Colbert musically advises frumpish Hopkins to “Jazz Up Your Lingerie.” 35mm. Approx. 88 min.

2:30, 6:00, 9:30
